*Please replace the square brackets and the text in it with your answers*

```
[
  {
    "Cluster 0": "64 Core * 8" + "16 Core * 4"
  },

    "Cluster 1": "16 Core"
  },

    "Cluster 2": "16 Core"
  }
]
```

```
[
    128 GB --> 64 Core

]

```
